ygData.subject: Re: Help me!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm... as far as druids go... My first character ever was a druid, a half-elven one at that. I didn t know what I was doing and I believe his base wisdom is 93
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm... as far as druids go... My first character
ever was a druid, a half-elven one at that. I didn't
know what I was doing and I believe his base wisdom is
93 or so... abysmal for a druid. <shrugs> But
I liked the guy gosh darn it. He is the only druid
I have ever made though. There's enough druids in
this world, I think. We get stuck with some of the
worst stigma in the realm of Norrath. One druid's bad
actions reflect in the eyes of warriors and other classes
upon a hundred other druids. (actually, I do have
another druid, by the same name on a server which split
off from Karana, just so I could still chat
occassionally with friends. I think he got level 2 and has been
that way.)<br><br>As far as Iksar go, it is possible
to not be as hated as some would have you think. I
have seen Iksar monks in Qeynos and Iksar
shadowknights in North Qeynos and Kelethin. It's all about
faction. Iksar make one of the best necromancer races in
the game, at level 10 my necro Kroq can regenerate
mana twice as fast as any other caster his age (save
for other Iksarian necros) and still gain HP (due to
the accelerated regeneration). Makes for easy
soloing, and even better grouping. <br><br>-Remember-
Everquest is a group oriented game. At some point in your
Norrathian life, you will be in a group. Start young, when
mistakes do not matter quite as much. There are far too
many 40th level folks running around, grouping for the
first time, leads to terrible terrible instances.
Ick...<br><br>-Note: It is a game. Never act like it is life, I've
seen too many people get pissed that they missed their
spawn or lost an item and then just up and quit the
game. It is there for you to have fun with it, if you
aren't having fun, then you aren't doing it
right.<br><br>Welcome to Norrath, and may the gods smile upon you,
whichever god you happen to follow.<br><br>Nukai
Oakenwulf<br>Cheif Druid Executive of Spiritus Valorum - Karana
Chapter
